Vitality.text: Increase the Health of all Champions by {}.

Greater Vitality.text: Increase the Health of all Champions by {}%.

Salve.text: Your Champions recover {} Health twice per second for 60 seconds. No effect on robots.

Recovery.text: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {}%

Energy Resistance.text: Increase any Health your Champions recover during a fight by {}%

Physical Resistance.text: Increase Resistance against Physical damage by {} for all Champions.

Block Proficiency.text: Increase the Block Proficiency of your Champions by {}.

Perfect Block.text: While Blocking, your Champions have a {}% chance to perform a Perfect Block.

Stand Your Ground.text: While Blocking, your Champions have a {}% chance to resist a Block Break.

Collar Tech.text: Retrofit Tech Champions with a field that inhibits enemy Power Gain by {}%.

Serum Science.text: Give Science Champions a Serum of {} Energy Resistance.

Willpower.text: For each new type of detrimental effect your champions suffer, they regenerate {}% Health per second and gain +{} Armor until that effect expires. No effect on robots.

Coagulate.text: Your Champions take {}% less damage from any Bleed effect they suffer.

Suture.text: Reduce the duration of enemy Bleed effects by {}%.

Inequity.text: Decrease opponents' Attack by {}% for each detrimental effect they sufer, up to a maximum of 36% reduction.

Resonate.text: Contact & Physical Attacks have a {} chance to Weaken the opponent, reducing their Attack by {}% for {} seconds.

Strength.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}.

Greater Strength.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%.

Pierce.text: Critical Hits from your Champions ignore an additional {}% of Armor.

Lesser Precision.text: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {}.

Precision.text: Increase the Critical Rate of all Champions by {}.

Lesser Cruelty.text: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {}.

Cruelty.text: Increase the Critical Damage of all Champions by {}.

Courage.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}% while they're below 50% Health.

Extended Fury.text: Increase the duration of Fury by {} second(s).

Enhanced Fury.text: Increase the effectiveness of Fury by {}%.

Pure Skill.text: With extensive field training, Skill Champions ignore an additional {} enemy Armor with Critical Hits.

Mutagenesis.text: Rapid mutagenesis closes Bleed wounds in your Mutant Champions {} second(s) faster than non-Mutants.

Glass Canon.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%, but reduce their maximum Health by {}%.

Recoil.text: Increase Special Attack damage for all Champions by {}%, but they sacrifice {}% Health for each activation.

Liquid Courage.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%, but they suffer an eternal Poison that drains {}% Health each second.

Double Edge.text: Increase the Attack of all Champions by {}%, but up to {}% Health is lost by Bleeding over {} seconds.

Despair.text: Debuffs applied to enemies reduce their healing and Regeneration by {}% each

Deep Wounds.text: Bleed your Champions inflict lasts {} seconds longer. If they have more HP than their target, their Bleed instantly strikes down an additional {}% max Health from enemies.

Unfazed.text: When an enemy Evades, your Champions have a {}% chance to stack an additional {} Critical Damage for their next Critical hit and become Unstoppable for {} seconds

Assassin.text: Against enemies below 18% Health your Champions gain {}% Attack and decrease enemies' defense Ability Accuracy by {}%.  If enemies start the fight below 18% your Champions also gain 30% offensive Ability Accuracy.

Wisdom.text: Earn +{} XP with all Summoner XP rewards.

Intelligence.text: Increases all Summoner XP rewards by {}%.

Limber.text: Rigorous mental and physical training reduces the duration of enemy Stun effects by {}%.

Parry.text: Timing a Block right when attacked reduces damage by {}%. If contact is made, Stun attackers for up to {} second(s). Stun duration increases with Perfect Block Chance.

Stupefy.text: When your champions inflict Stun, it lasts for {} additional second(s).

Petrify.text: When your Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy Health and Power gains by up to {}% for the duration of the Stun.

Pacify.text: When you Champions inflict Stun, they also reduce enemy ability triggers by {}% for the duration of the Stun.

Dexterity.text: Evade all attacks while Dodging back. Dodging an attack in this way grants {}% Critical Rate for your next attack.

Pitance.text: Earn +{} Gold with all Gold rewards.

Cosmic Awareness.text: Imbue Cosmic Champions with perception rivalling Heimdall, reducing enemy Armor Up effectiveness by {}%

Mystic Dispersion.text: Your Mystic Champions accrue {}% Power each time an enemy beneficial effect expires.

Detect Cosmic.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Cosmic enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

Detect Tech.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Tech enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

Detect Mystic.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Mystic enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

Scouter Lens.text: Reveal the hidden Hero Rating and Star Rating of enemies up to {} steps away on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

Detect Mutant.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Mutant enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

Detect Science.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Science enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.

Detect Skill.text: Reveal the hidden Class of Skill enemies up to {} steps on a Quest Map. This information is shared with allies.
